questions.question: What is the predominant color of the sofa's upholstery?
What is the overall shape or configuration of the sofa?
What appears to be the primary material of the sofa's covering?
How many distinct seating cushions are visibly present on the sofa?
Describe the visible texture of the sofa's upholstery; is it smooth or something else?
What color are the visible legs or feet supporting the sofa?
What is the apparent material of the sofa's legs or feet?
Is there a throw pillow or cushion included with the sofa, as shown?
What is the general style of the sofa's armrests; are they straight, curved, or rolled?
Considering the design, what is the sofa's seating capacity; how many people?
What is the apparent style of the sofa's cushions; boxy, loose, or tailored?
Are there any noticeable seams or stitching details on the upholstery?
Does the sofa feature any visible decorative elements or embellishments?
Describe the sofa's back height in relation to its seat; is it high or low?
What is the overall construction type; is it a frame-based sofa, or another?
